name: HandyWorld
description:
*IMPORTANT* 

THIS GAME REQUIRES A WEBCAM TO PLAY!

HandyWorld is a 2D action platformer which experiments with combining traditional controls with webcam-based hand motion controls. The game is in an alpha test state with prototype elements still in development.

  • Run, jump, and stab your way through enemies in ten demo levels.
  • Hand tracking and gesture recognition using only your webcam.
  • Slow down time and use your hand to cast spells and interact with objects.

Controls - Keyboard

Jump - Space bar / Up arrow / W Move left - Left arrow / A Move right - Right arrow / D Down - Down arrow / S Turn on hand tracking - Enter / F Attack - Right shift / Left shift Interact with door - Period / E Open menu - ESC / P

Controls - Gamepad

Jump - D pad up / Face button bottom Move left - Left thumbstick left / D pad left Move right - Left thumbstick right / D pad right Down - Left thumbstick down Turn on hand tracking - Left or Right shoulder button Attack - Face button left Interact with door - Face button top Open menu - Special button right
